text: Aey dawood! Hum ney tumhen zamin mein khalifa bana diya tum logon kay darmiyan haq kay sath faislay kero aur apni nafsani khuwaish ki perwi na kero werna woh tumhen Allah ki raah say bhatka deygi yaqeenan jo log Allah ki raah say bhatak jatay hain unn kay liye sakht azab hai iss liye kay unhon ney hisab kay din ko bhula diya hai
